# Interface LLMRoutingConfig

Configuration for individual LLM routing entry

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "LLMRoutingConfig".

interface LLMRoutingConfig {  
error_cooldown_seconds: string | number;  
llm_component_id: string;  
min_errors: string | number;  
priority: string | number;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

error_cooldown_seconds llm_component_id min_errors priority

## Properties

### error_cooldown_seconds

error_cooldown_seconds: string | number

Duration in seconds to wait before retrying an LLM that has experienced errors

### llm_component_id

llm_component_id: string

ID of the LLM component to retrieve from ComponentRegistry

### min_errors

min_errors: string | number

Minimum number of consecutive errors required before an LLM is temporarily excluded

### priority

priority: string | number

Priority level for this LLM instance. Higher values indicate higher priority

### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
